# -*- CMakeLists.txt generated by CodeLite IDE. Do not edit by hand -*-

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

project(relearn_dl)

# Define some variables
set(PROJECT_relearn_dl_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}")
set(WORKSPACE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/..")



#{{{{ User Code 1
# Place your code here
#}}}}

include_directories(
    .
    .
    ./include

)


# Compiler options
add_definitions(-pedantic-errors)
add_definitions(-g)
add_definitions(-O0)
add_definitions(-std=c++17)
add_definitions(-Wall)
add_definitions(-W)

# Linker options


if(WIN32)
    # Resource options
endif(WIN32)

# Library path
link_directories(
    .
)

# Define the CXX sources
set ( CXX_SRCS
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/relearn_dl.cpp
)

set_source_files_properties(
    ${CXX_SRCS} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS 
    " -pedantic-errors -g -O0 -std=c++17 -Wall")

if(WIN32)
    enable_language(RC)
    set(CMAKE_RC_COMPILE_OBJECT
        "<CMAKE_RC_COMPILER> ${RC_OPTIONS} -O coff -i <SOURCE> -o <OBJECT>")
endif(WIN32)



#{{{{ User Code 2
# Place your code here
#}}}}

add_library(relearn_dl SHARED ${RC_SRCS} ${CXX_SRCS} ${C_SRCS})
target_link_libraries(relearn_dl ${LINK_OPTIONS})



#{{{{ User Code 3
# Place your code here
#}}}}
